channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiNAC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiNAC

item.title: CVE-2022-45858|2024-10-22T20:46:24.743Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: A use of a weak cryptographic algorithm vulnerability [CWE-327] in FortiNAC 9.4.1 and below, 9.2.6 and below, 9.1.0 all versions, 8.8.0 all versions, 8.7.0 all versions may increase the chances of an attacker to have access to sensitive information or to perform man-in-the-middle attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-45859|2024-10-22T20:46:40.435Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: An insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability [CWE-522] in FortiNAC-F 7.2.0, FortiNAC 9.4.1 and below, 9.2.6 and below, 9.1.8 and below, 8.8.0 all versions, 8.7.0 all versions may allow a local attacker with system access to retrieve users' passwords.

item.title: CVE-2022-43950|2024-10-22T20:46:32.741Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: A URL redirection to untrusted site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability [CWE-601] in FortiNAC-F version 7.2.0, FortiNAC version 9.4.1 and below, 9.2 all versions, 9.1 all versions, 8.8 all versions, 8.7 all versions may allow an unauthenticated attacker to redirect users to any arbitrary website via a crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-38376|2024-10-22T20:49:55.702Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: Multiple improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerabilities [CWE-79] in Fortinet FortiNAC portal UI before 9.4.1 allows an attacker to perform an XSS attack via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2022-39946|2024-10-22T20:46:16.560Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: An access control vulnerability [CWE-284] in FortiNAC version 9.4.2 and below, version 9.2.7 and below, 9.1 all versions, 8.8 all versions, 8.7 all versions, 8.6 all versions, 8.5 all versions may allow a remote attacker authenticated on the administrative interface to perform unauthorized jsp calls via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-31488|2024-06-04T17:36:26.094Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: An improper neutralization of inputs during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiNAC version 9.4.0 through 9.4.4, 9.2.0 through 9.2.8, 9.1.0 through 9.1.10, 8.8.0 through 8.8.11, 8.7.0 through 8.7.6, 7.2.0 through 7.2.3 may allow a remote authenticated attacker to perform stored and reflected cross site scripting (XSS) attack via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-31488|2024-08-02T01:52:57.296Z -- fortinet -- fortinac
item.description: An improper neutralization of inputs during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiNAC version 9.4.0 through 9.4.4, 9.2.0 through 9.2.8, 9.1.0 through 9.1.10, 8.8.0 through 8.8.11, 8.7.0 through 8.7.6, 7.2.0 through 7.2.3 may allow a remote authenticated attacker to perform stored and reflected cross site scripting (XSS) attack via crafted HTTP requests.
